about_the_game:
Instantly unlocks V & Vergil Alt Colors.

Note: V's colors can be changed on the character selection screen. Vergil's colors can be changed in Options ＞ Cutscene Customize.

This content can also be unlocked through in-game progress, so please take care to avoid duplicate purchases.
